author: jpata
body:
Add a one-stop reco profiling script in `reco_profiling/profileRunner.py`.

It can be called with the following options (`--out-dir` is mandatory, the others are the defaults)
```
python3 reco_profiling/profileRunner.py --workflow 23434.21 --num-events 100 --out-dir profile_out
```

and it will create and run steps1-4, where steps 3-4 are repeated with the necessary profiling options.
The outputs are copied to `profile_out`, the script will fail if any of the steps fail and any of the outputs are missing or empty.

Comments & suggestions welcome!

cc @slava77 @gartung @smuzaffar
title: Reco profiling
